license_title: Creative Commons Attribution for Intergovernmental Organisations
name: global-hpc-hno-2024
notes: This dataset contains standardised Humanitarian Needs Overview data taken from the OCHA HPC Tools system which is under active development. For more detailed but less standardized data on humanitarian needs, see the [Humanitarian Needs Overview data series](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/?dataseries_name=Humanitarian+Needs+Overview).

organization.name: ocha-hpc-tools
organization.title: OCHA Humanitarian Programme Cycle Tools (HPC Tools)
organization.description: OCHA’s HPC.tools are online platforms that enable the humanitarian community to structure and manage information around the Humanitarian Programme Cycle (HPC).

solr_additions: {"countries": ["Afghanistan", "Burkina Faso", "Cameroon", "Central African Republic", "Chad", "Colombia", "Democratic Republic of the Congo", "El Salvador", "Ethiopia", "Guatemala", "Haiti", "Honduras", "Mali", "Mozambique", "Myanmar", "Niger", "Nigeria", "Somalia", "South Sudan", "Sudan", "Syrian Arab Republic", "Ukraine", "Venezuela (Bolivarian Republic of)", "Yemen"]}
title: Global Humanitarian Programme Cycle, Humanitarian Needs 2024
